Literature.Title: Designed Host Defense Peptides for the Treatment of Bacterial Keratitis.
Literature.Author: Clemens LE, Jaynes J, Lim E, Kolar SS, Reins RY, Baidouri H, Hanlon SM, Woodburn KW

Literature.Title: ANTIMICROBIAL PEPTIDES AND METHODS OF USE THEREOF
Literature.Author: Jaynes J, Clemens LE, Lopez HW, Martin GR

Literature.Title: Designed Antimicrobial Peptides for Topical Treatment of Antibiotic Resistant Acne Vulgaris.
Literature.Author: Woodburn KW, Jaynes J, Clemens LE

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human keratinocytes HaCat:50% Cell death=20 µg/ml
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Enterococcus faecium ATCC 700221(MIC=32µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 33591(MIC=16µg/ml),Staphylococcus epidermidis ATCC 51625(MIC=4µg/ml),Streptococcus pneumoniae ATCC 49619(MIC=64µg/ml),Klebsiella aerogenes ATCC 13048(MIC=8µg/ml),Acinetobacter baumannii ATCC 17978D-5(MIC=2µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 19660(MIC=32µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=8µg/ml),Burkholderia thailandensis(MBC50=14.77µM),Cutibacterium acnes ATCC 6919(MIC=2µg/ml),Cutibacterium acnes ATCC 11827(MIC=8µg/ml),Cutibacterium acnes(MIC=4-8µg/ml)
